title: Code Highlights
description: LSP highlights of the variable under the cursor settings.

debouncerDelay.title: Debouncer delay
debouncerDelay.description: Number of milliseconds to delay sending out the highlights request to the language server; you can get better responsiveness adjusting this value, but setting it to zero can actually slow it down as the server might get overwhelmed when moving the cursor.

removeOnBlur.title: Remove highlights on editor (e.g. cell) blur
removeOnBlur.description: Whether the highlights should disappear after the focus leaves the editor/cell

disable.title: Disable
disable.description: Disable this feature. Requires reloading JupyterLab to apply changes.
